title: Whats ruling on mixing Zam Zam water with other water
transcript: a says what's ruling on mixing zamzam water with other water this was reported by some of the companions whenever they got water from Med uh from meccah to Medina it was a long journey so when it came to yeah run out they used to add water to it so that the blessing would continue this is permissible especially for those who are living abroad I
